page.title: 05** DEPUTY LORD MAYOR **
page.content: The Lord Mayor could have engagements in Leeds, Morley, Pudsey, Weatherby or Crossgates. Other questions were:- "Do you find it difficult to run a shop with all your engagements and do you own any other shops in Leeds?" Councillor Hyde said it was very difficult at times and they depend on other people to help out. That was why Mrs. Hydes mother and father are seen in the shop quite a bit as they run it when Mr. and Mrs. Hyde cannot be there. They used to have a shop on York Road at Seacroft which was sold three years ago. Concillor Hyde said that it was just a little difficult because the people helping in that shop wished to do less work because they were past their time. They now only have one shop. {By Paul Thomas. Aged 12. {St. James Manston Middle School.
